description.txt: Please enter a password for user 'admin', the database administrator:

Configure the max amount of memory to be used by eXist-db. The minimum memory setting is 512m, but 1024m is recommended. If your machine has enough memory, using 2048m should be sufficient even for most data sets. Note: 1200m is usually the limit on 32 bit systems..

Configure the amount of memory to be reserved for internal caches. If max memory above is set to 1024m, 128m is a good value; for 2048m use 256m; for 512m not more than 64mb. Too small settings may lead to bad upload/indexing performance.
